title: Why eBay Auto-Delist/Relist Kills Your Promoted Listings (And How to Fix It)
excerpt: If you're using eBay's auto-delist/relist feature, you might be unknowingly killing your promoted listing campaigns every time. Here's how to set up promotions that actually stick around.
metaDescription: Auto-relisting on eBay breaks your promoted listing campaigns. Learn how rule-based promotions keep your ads running when listings get recreated.

title: The Reseller's Testing Playbook: Why A/B Testing Your Listings Can Double Your Sales
excerpt: Most resellers list items once and hope for the best. Smart resellers test different approaches and let the data guide their decisions, often doubling their conversion rates in the process.
metaDescription: Learn how successful resellers use A/B testing to optimize listings, boost conversion rates, and increase profits. Actionable testing strategies inside.

title: Best Reseller Software Tools for 2026: How AI is Revolutionizing Inventory & Listing Management
excerpt: The reselling landscape is evolving rapidly with AI-powered tools transforming how successful resellers manage inventory, create listings, and scale operations. Here's your complete guide to the software stack that'll dominate 2026.
metaDescription: Discover the best reseller software tools for 2026. AI-powered inventory management, cross-platform listing, and pricing solutions for serious resellers.
